Structs/Jumio/Theme/Value.html#/s:5Jumio.name: init(light:dark:)
Structs/Jumio/Theme/Value.html#/s:5Jumio.abstract: If you set only light/dark it will applied to both modes, otherwise you can specify the color for each mode

Structs/Jumio/Theme/Value.html.name: Value
Structs/Jumio/Theme/Value.html.abstract: Each customization option is represented by a Jumio.Theme.Value

Structs/Jumio/Theme/SearchBubble.html.name: SearchBubble
Structs/Jumio/Theme/SearchBubble.html.abstract: Country list search bar bubble customization options

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Part.html#/s:5JumioAA.name: retry(reason:)
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Part.html#/s:5JumioAA.abstract: Retry the execution of this scan part

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Part.html#/s:5JumioAA.name: getHelpAnimation()
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Part.html#/s:5JumioAA.abstract: Returns a help animation based on current Jumio.Scan.Mode or nil if not available

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.name: prepare
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.abstract: If a scan part needs to prepare or preload data before it starts, this can step is triggered.

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.name: started
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.abstract: Indicates that the scanning has been started. Loading indicators that have been displayed in .prepare can be dismissed here

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.name: scanView
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.abstract: The started part needs a Jumio.Scan.View attached. See Jumio.Scan.View for more information

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.name: attachFile
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.abstract: The started part needs an URL to a file. See Jumio.FileAttacher

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.name: imageTaken
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.abstract: The image has been taken and is uploaded to the Jumio server for processing

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.name: processing
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.abstract: The image is being processed on the servers

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.name: confirmationView
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.abstract: The image has been accepted and the user can review it to make sure the right image has been captured

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.name: rejectView
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.abstract: The image has been rejected - the image needs to be scanned again

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.name: retry
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.abstract: There was a retry-able issue during the scanning. The Jumio.Retry.Reason provides a code and a message on what has happened

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.name: canFinish
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.abstract: The scan part has been captured successfully and the part can be finished

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.name: addonScanPart
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html#/s:5JumioAA.abstract: An additional, optional scan part can be added.

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Update/FallbackReason.name: userAction
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Update/FallbackReason.abstract: Initiated by the user through the call of Jumio.Scan.ScanPart.fallback()

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Update/FallbackReason.name: lowPerformance
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Update/FallbackReason.abstract: Initiated due to low performance on the current Jumio.Scan.Mode

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Update.html#/s:5Jumio.name: fallback(_:)
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Update.html#/s:5Jumio.abstract: A fallback was triggered on the current scan mode. See Jumio.Scan.Update.FallbackReason for more information

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Update.html#/s:5Jumio.name: legalHint
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Update.html#/s:5Jumio.abstract: A legal hint needs to be shown to the user. The message is being delivered as a String in the data parameter of Jumio.Scan.Part.Delegate.jumio(scanPart:updates:data:)

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Update.html#/s:5Jumio.name: nfcExtractionStarted
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Update.html#/s:5Jumio.abstract: NFC extraction has been started - please inform the user to not move the device away

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Update.html#/s:5Jumio.name: nfcExtractionProgress
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Update.html#/s:5Jumio.abstract: NFC extraction is in progress - the progress is being delivered as an Integer (0-100) in the data parameter of Jumio.Scan.Part.Delegate.jumio(scanPart:updates:data:)

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Update.html#/s:5Jumio.name: nfcExtractionFinished
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Update.html#/s:5Jumio.abstract: NFC extraction has been finished - the user can remove the device from the document

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Update.html#/s:5Jumio.name: extractionState(_:)
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Update.html#/s:5Jumio.abstract: A new extraction state occurred. See Jumio.Scan.Update.ExtractionState for more information

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Mode.html#/s:5JumioAA.name: faceManual
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Mode.html#/s:5JumioAA.abstract: Manual face capturing with a shutter button

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Mode.html#/s:5JumioAA.name: barcode
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Mode.html#/s:5JumioAA.abstract: PDF417 barcode scanning e.g. US and CAN driver licenses

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Mode.html#/s:5JumioAA.name: mrz
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Mode.html#/s:5JumioAA.abstract: Passports, some identity cards and some visas

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Update.html.name: Update
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Update.html.abstract: Jumio.Scan.Update are optional hints that occur during scanning

Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html.name: Step
Structs/Jumio/Scan/Step.html.abstract: Jumio.Scan.Step are steps that occur during scanning

Structs/Jumio/Result.html#/s:5JumioAAV6R.name: getIDResult(of:)
Structs/Jumio/Result.html#/s:5JumioAAV6R.abstract: Returns Jumio.IDResult of provided Jumio.Credential.Info in case Jumio.Credential.Info.category is Jumio.Credential.Category.id, otherwise nil

Structs/Jumio/Result.html#/s:5JumioAAV6R.name: getFaceResult(of:)
Structs/Jumio/Result.html#/s:5JumioAAV6R.abstract: Returns Jumio.FaceResult of provided Jumio.Credential.Info in case Jumio.Credential.Info.category is Jumio.Credential.Category.face, otherwise nil

Structs/Jumio/ImageData.html#/s:5JumioAA.name: images
Structs/Jumio/ImageData.html#/s:5JumioAA.abstract: A dictionary to access UIImage for a requested Jumio.Scan.Side

Structs/Jumio/ISOCountryConverter.html#/.name: toAlpha2(_:)
Structs/Jumio/ISOCountryConverter.html#/.abstract: Converts an supplied ISO 3166 ALPHA-3 code into the corresponding ISO 3166 ALPHA-2 code e.g. “USA” to “US”

Structs/Jumio/ISOCountryConverter.html#/.name: toAlpha3(_:)
Structs/Jumio/ISOCountryConverter.html#/.abstract: Converts an supplied ISO 3166 ALPHA-2 code into the corresponding ISO 3166 ALPHA-3 code e.g. “US” to “USA”

Structs/Jumio/IDCredential.html#/s:5Jumi.name: countries
Structs/Jumio/IDCredential.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: Represents all available countries in ISO 3166 ALPHA-3 with a corresponding list of Jumio.Document

Structs/Jumio/IDCredential.html#/s:5Jumi.name: suggestedCountry
Structs/Jumio/IDCredential.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: Suggests a country in ISO 3166 ALPHA-3 based on device region, if this country is supported

Structs/Jumio/IDCredential.html#/s:5Jumi.name: isSupportedConfiguration(country:document:)
Structs/Jumio/IDCredential.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: Validates a given country and document combination

Structs/Jumio/IDCredential.html#/s:5Jumi.name: setConfiguration(country:document:)
Structs/Jumio/IDCredential.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: Sets a given country and document combination

Structs/Jumio/FileAttacher.html#/s:5Jumi.name: fileRequirements
Structs/Jumio/FileAttacher.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: Mandatory requirements for the file to attach

Structs/Jumio/FileAttacher.html#/s:5Jumi.name: attach(scanPart:)
Structs/Jumio/FileAttacher.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: Attach the file attacher to Jumio.Scan.Part after Jumio.Scan.Step.attachFile event has been received to enable file attaching

Structs/Jumio/FaceResult.html#/s:5JumioA.name: passed
Structs/Jumio/FaceResult.html#/s:5JumioA.abstract: Liveness check result - nil if not performed

Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.name: dependencyWrongVersion
Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: One or more dependencies have a wrong version and are not compatible. Workflow is aborted

Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.name: noDataCenterSet
Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: Started SDK without setting a data center

Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.name: deadController
Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: Controller already got cancelled or finished and is not valid anymore

Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.name: errorNotRetryable
Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: Trying to call retry on a non retryable error

Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.name: needToConsentFirst
Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: A policy URL was provided but user has not consented to it. Therefore creation of credentials are blocked

Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.name: controllerNotCompleted
Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: Tried to finish a controller, which still has incomplete credentials

Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.name: isBeingFinished
Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: A finish process is already in progress

Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.name: multipleCredentials
Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: There can only be one active credential at a time. Please cancel or finish your current one

Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.name: deadCredential
Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: Credential already got cancelled or finished and is not valid anymore

Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.name: credentialNotCompleted
Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: Tried to finish a credential, which still has incomplete scan parts

Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.name: multipleScanParts
Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: There can only be one active scan part at a time. Please cancel or finish your current one

Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.name: scanPartNotCompleted
Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: Tried to finish a scan part, which still is processing

Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.name: deadScanPart
Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: Scan part already got cancelled or finished and is not valid anymore

Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.name: noFallbackAvailable
Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: Tried to call fallback, but there is non available

Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.name: takePictureNotAllowed
Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html#/s:5Jumi.abstract: Tried to call take picture, but it is not enabled

Structs/Jumio/SetupError.html#/s:5JumioA.name: requestedViewControllerForCustomUI
Structs/Jumio/SetupError.html#/s:5JumioA.abstract: Requested a viewcontroller although custom ui was selected

Structs/Jumio/CredentialResult.html#/s:5.name: extractionMode
Structs/Jumio/CredentialResult.html#/s:5.abstract: Jumio.Scan.Mode used for the extraction of this credential

Structs/Jumio/Credential.html#/s:5JumioA.name: parts
Structs/Jumio/Credential.html#/s:5JumioA.abstract: Represents all the Jumio.Scan.Part that are required for this credential

Structs/Jumio/Credential.html#/s:5JumioA.name: isConfigured
Structs/Jumio/Credential.html#/s:5JumioA.abstract: Indicates if this credential is configured and scanSides are available.

Structs/Jumio/Credential.html#/s:5JumioA.name: isComplete
Structs/Jumio/Credential.html#/s:5JumioA.abstract: Indicates if all Jumio.Scan.Part of this credential have been successfully completed

Structs/Jumio/Credential.html#/s:5JumioA.name: initScanPart(_:scanPartDelegate:)
Structs/Jumio/Credential.html#/s:5JumioA.abstract: Initializes and returns a Jumio.Scan.Part based on the provided Jumio.Scan.Side

Structs/Jumio/Credential.html#/s:5JumioA.name: getAddonScanPart(scanPartDelegate:)
Structs/Jumio/Credential.html#/s:5JumioA.abstract: Returns an addon scan part if available

Structs/Jumio/Controller.html#/s:5JumioA.name: isComplete
Structs/Jumio/Controller.html#/s:5JumioA.abstract: Inidicates if all Jumio.Credential have been successfully completed

Structs/Jumio/Controller.html#/s:5JumioA.name: start(credentialInfo:)
Structs/Jumio/Controller.html#/s:5JumioA.abstract: Starts and returns a Jumio.Credential based on the provided Jumio.Credential.Info

Structs/Jumio/Controller.html#/s:5JumioA.name: retry(error:)
Structs/Jumio/Controller.html#/s:5JumioA.abstract: Retry the specified Jumio.Error if it is retryable

Structs/Jumio/Controller.html#/s:5JumioA.name: userConsented()
Structs/Jumio/Controller.html#/s:5JumioA.abstract: Needs to be called in case a policy URL is specified in Jumio.Controller.Delegate.jumio(controller:didInitializeWith:policyUrl)

Structs/Jumio/SDK.html#/s:5JumioAAV3SDKC.name: isJailbroken
Structs/Jumio/SDK.html#/s:5JumioAAV3SDKC.abstract: Checks if the device is jail broken

Structs/Jumio/SDK.html#/s:5JumioAAV3SDKC.name: dataCenter
Structs/Jumio/SDK.html#/s:5JumioAAV3SDKC.abstract: Specify the data center in which the token has been generated

Structs/Jumio/SDK.html#/s:5JumioAAV3SDKC.name: token
Structs/Jumio/SDK.html#/s:5JumioAAV3SDKC.abstract: A Jumio SDK token. This token contains information about the workflow, credential, transaction identifiers and other parameters

Structs/Jumio/SDK.html#/s:5JumioAAV3SDKC.name: viewController()
Structs/Jumio/SDK.html#/s:5JumioAAV3SDKC.abstract: Returns a Jumio.ViewController if workflow got started by calling Jumio.SDK.startDefaultUI()

Structs/Jumio/SDK.html#/s:5JumioAAV3SDKC.name: startDefaultUI()
Structs/Jumio/SDK.html#/s:5JumioAAV3SDKC.abstract: Starts the SDK in default UI with the specified token and data center

Structs/Jumio/SDK.html#/s:5JumioAAV3SDKC.name: start(_:)
Structs/Jumio/SDK.html#/s:5JumioAAV3SDKC.abstract: Starts the SDK in custom UI with the specified token and data center

Structs/Jumio/SDK.html#/s:5JumioAAV3SDKC.name: customize(theme:)
Structs/Jumio/SDK.html#/s:5JumioAAV3SDKC.abstract: Customize the SDK theme overriden with prefered options

Structs/Jumio/SDK.html#/s:5JumioAAV3SDKC.name: giveDataDogConsent(enabled:)
Structs/Jumio/SDK.html#/s:5JumioAAV3SDKC.abstract: When DataDog plugin is linked this method can control the user consent for analytics data collection. By default consent is granted.

Structs/Jumio/SDK.html.name: SDK
Structs/Jumio/SDK.html.abstract: Is used to setup and start a workflow based on a pre-generated SDK token

Structs/Jumio.html#/s:5JumioAAV7AcquireV.name: Acquire
Structs/Jumio.html#/s:5JumioAAV7AcquireV.abstract: List of possible acquire modes for the scan method Document

Structs/Jumio/Confirmation.html.name: Confirmation
Structs/Jumio/Confirmation.html.abstract: Namespace for confirmation related enums and classes

Structs/Jumio/Controller.html.name: Controller
Structs/Jumio/Controller.html.abstract: Handles the Jumio.Credential initialization and the workflow lifecycle

Structs/Jumio/Credential.html.name: Credential
Structs/Jumio/Credential.html.abstract: Handles the Jumio.Scan.Part initialization and the credential lifecycle

Structs/Jumio/DocumentCredential.html.name: DocumentCredential
Structs/Jumio/DocumentCredential.html.abstract: Takes care of the document verification process

Structs/Jumio/SetupError.html.name: SetupError
Structs/Jumio/SetupError.html.abstract: Setup errors occur when you request views or view controllers from the SDK, which are not available

Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html.name: LogicalError
Structs/Jumio/LogicalError.html.abstract: Logical errors occur due to suboptimal integration and are hints to what is being called wrong

Structs/Jumio/FaceCredential.html.name: FaceCredential
Structs/Jumio/FaceCredential.html.abstract: Takes care of the identity verification process

Structs/Jumio/FileAttacher.html.name: FileAttacher
Structs/Jumio/FileAttacher.html.abstract: Some scan parts (e.g. Document) allow direct file upload. Use this class to provide the url to the file.

Structs/Jumio/FileRequirements.html.name: FileRequirements
Structs/Jumio/FileRequirements.html.abstract: Some scan parts (e.g. Document) allow direct file upload. Use this class to provide the url to the file.

Structs/Jumio/IDCredential.html.name: IDCredential
Structs/Jumio/IDCredential.html.abstract: Takes care of the ID verification process

Structs/Jumio/ISOCountryConverter.html.name: ISOCountryConverter
Structs/Jumio/ISOCountryConverter.html.abstract: Utility class to convert ISO 3166 ALPHA-2 to ISO 3166 ALPHA-3 and vice versa

Structs/Jumio/ImageData.html.name: ImageData
Structs/Jumio/ImageData.html.abstract: Gives access to all scanned images from a Jumio.Credential

Structs/Jumio/Reject.html.name: Reject
Structs/Jumio/Reject.html.abstract: Namespace for reject related enums and classes

Structs/Jumio/Result.html.name: Result
Structs/Jumio/Result.html.abstract: Jumio.Result contains information about the workflow and provides access to the credential results

Structs/Jumio/Retry.html.name: Retry
Structs/Jumio/Retry.html.abstract: Namespace for retry related enums and classes

Structs/Jumio/Scan.html.name: Scan
Structs/Jumio/Scan.html.abstract: Namespace for scan related enums and classes

Structs/Jumio/Theme.html.name: Theme
Structs/Jumio/Theme.html.abstract: Jumio.Theme is used to customize SDK colors

Structs/Jumio.html.name: Jumio
Structs/Jumio.html.abstract: This struct does not contain any implementation. It is only used as a namespace for all of our classes like Jumio.SDK

Protocols/JumioScanPartDelegate.html#/s:.name: jumio(scanPart:updates:data:)
Protocols/JumioScanPartDelegate.html#/s:.abstract: Jumio.Scan.Update are optional hints that occur during scanning

Protocols/JumioScanPartDelegate.html#/s:.name: jumio(scanPart:step:data:)
Protocols/JumioScanPartDelegate.html#/s:.abstract: Jumio.Scan.Step are steps that occur during scanning

Protocols/JumioDefaultUIDelegate.html#/s.name: jumio(sdk:finished:)
Protocols/JumioDefaultUIDelegate.html#/s.abstract: The final callback after workflow has been finished

Protocols/JumioControllerDelegate.html#/.name: jumio(controller:didInitializeWith:policyUrl:)
Protocols/JumioControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: SDK settings are loaded and all credentials of this workflow are provided

Protocols/JumioControllerDelegate.html#/.name: jumio(controller:finished:)
Protocols/JumioControllerDelegate.html#/.abstract: The final callback after Jumio.Controller.finish() has been called.

Classes/JumioScanView.html#/s:5Jumio0A8S.name: isShutterEnabled
Classes/JumioScanView.html#/s:5Jumio0A8S.abstract: Indicates if a manual shutter button needs to be displayed

Classes/JumioScanView.html#/s:5Jumio0A8S.name: isSwitchEnabled
Classes/JumioScanView.html#/s:5Jumio0A8S.abstract: Indicates if camera switch button needs to be displayed

Classes/JumioScanView.html#/s:5Jumio0A8S.name: hasFlash
Classes/JumioScanView.html#/s:5Jumio0A8S.abstract: Indicates if the current camera has a flash light

Classes/JumioScanView.html#/s:5Jumio0A8S.name: cameraFacing
Classes/JumioScanView.html#/s:5Jumio0A8S.abstract: Responsible for the Jumio.CameraFacing of this scan view

Classes/JumioScanView.html#/s:5Jumio0A8S.name: extraction
Classes/JumioScanView.html#/s:5Jumio0A8S.abstract: Controls the image extraction of the camera feed

Classes/JumioScanView.html#/s:5Jumio0A8S.name: attach(scanPart:)
Classes/JumioScanView.html#/s:5Jumio0A8S.abstract: Attach the scan view to Jumio.Scan.Part after Jumio.Scan.Step.scanView event has been received to enable scanning

Classes/JumioRejectView.html#/s:5Jumio0A.name: attach(scanPart:)
Classes/JumioRejectView.html#/s:5Jumio0A.abstract: Attach the reject view to Jumio.Scan.Part after Jumio.Scan.Step.rejectView event has been received

Classes/JumioRejectView.html#/s:5Jumio0A.name: retake()
Classes/JumioRejectView.html#/s:5Jumio0A.abstract: The scanned image has been declined by Jumio and therefore the scanning needs to be restarted

Classes/JumioConfirmationView.html#/s:5J.name: attach(scanPart:)
Classes/JumioConfirmationView.html#/s:5J.abstract: Attach the confirmation view to Jumio.Scan.Part after Jumio.Scan.Step.confirmationView event has been received

Classes/JumioConfirmationView.html#/s:5J.name: retake()
Classes/JumioConfirmationView.html#/s:5J.abstract: The scanned image is declined by the user and the scanning is restarted

Classes/JumioConfirmationView.html#/s:5J.name: confirm()
Classes/JumioConfirmationView.html#/s:5J.abstract: The scanned image is confirmed by the user

Classes/JumioConfirmationView.html.name: JumioConfirmationView
Classes/JumioConfirmationView.html.abstract: A custom view to display the confirmation image of a Jumio.Scan.Part

Classes/JumioRejectView.html.name: JumioRejectView
Classes/JumioRejectView.html.abstract: A custom view to display the reject image of a Jumio.Scan.Part

Classes/JumioScanView.html.name: JumioScanView
Classes/JumioScanView.html.abstract: A custom view to display the camera preview and enable scanning of a Jumio.Scan.Part

Classes.html#/c:@M@Jumio@objc(cs)JumioVi.name: JumioViewController
Classes.html#/c:@M@Jumio@objc(cs)JumioVi.abstract: A view controller implementation which is used if a workflow got started by default UI
